== Lamp Post ==

[[File:Village_Lamp_Post.png|thumb|Lamp Post (Plains, Old)]]

There is no difference between the different lamp posts other than the desert and plains villages have oak fences, the taiga villages have spruce fences, and the savanna villages have acacia fences.
